website_summaries.verdict: You can feel this spa-quality mask working as it exfoliates and firms skin.
pros: Minimizes pores and clears away dead, dull skin to reveal a brighter complexion
Customers find it effective to use once a week
cons: Mask takes about 10 minutes and a few minutes to fully rinse off

website_summaries.verdict: A pot of skincare gold created as a 10-minute professional 'facial in a jar' for Hollywood celebrities – just don't overload on it.
pros: This 10-minute facial will have you looking like a movie star in no time
Gently exfoliates to make skin smoother and brighter
Eliminates redness and makes skin softer
Works well for both men and women
cons: Can make you break out if you use too much

customer_reviews.title: Still one of Favs but ...
customer_reviews.text: This is still one of my all-time favorite products even with the sleigh reformulations. I buy one/month because I like it so much and have been buying this for years . HOWEVER The sellers on Amazon think it’s OK to take it out of the factory sealed box that it comes in 👉🏻 This IS NOT OK And I will return it every time. The sealed box is what we are paying for along with the enclosed brochure.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Best cleaning mask
customer_reviews.text: I bought the black, white and blue jar from Glam Glow to try them out. For now, I love this one the best! My skin is combination to oily, it does help with a deep clean without stretching the poles. Although the first few treatments you may feel slightly irritate, it should be fine, I personally spray some toner if drying too fast. Once I wash it off, my skin is refreshing. And I sometimes follow up with a hydrating mask or rich cream. But I don't recommend to someone who has sensitive or damaged skin. Overall this product is my weekly cleaning routine now!
customer_reviews.author: DxmXKA

customer_reviews.title: ... referred to me buy a few friends who had great luck. While it didn't do all that I ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as it was referred to me buy a few friends who had great luck. While it didn't do all that I hoped I definitely noticed a nice difference in my skin from using it. I think this is a great product for those with minor to somewhat troubled skin, anything more than that I just don't think it would work as well. I have hormonal breakouts and it didn't work for that but it worked nicely for the overall appearance of my skin in general, softer, smoother and less shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Dana C.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing stuff! My skin looked and felt fabulous after using!
customer_reviews.text: My skin looks and feels amazing after using this. Super soft and glowy. The only thing I dont care for is there are leaves and twig bits in it which is weird I feel like they cld have used a mortar and pestle or grinder before mixing it it.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa K. Pope

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was my third repurchase of Glamglow. I love this product. It gives my skin a fresh clean feeling as well as living up to its name. It really makes my skin glow in a natural healthy way. I use it once every 7 to 10 days as maintenance and ALWAYS before a special occasion. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: katelyna

customer_reviews.title: Once a week should be fine. This mask is super intense so I don't ...
customer_reviews.text: Makes my skin feel soooo soft afterwards. I try to do it every Wednesday. Once a week should be fine. This mask is super intense so I don't recommend any more than that. Also it's considerably pricey for the amount you get but a little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.author: tracy tran

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful facemask!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a friend, and she loved it! So much so that she invited me over to enjoy it with her. It leaves your face feeling refreshed and rejuvenated. I would purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Jac Ro

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! A great exfoliant/mask, as a paramedical esthetician I really enjoy this product. Deep cleansing, deep exfoliation. Follow up with a moisturizer. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing, it’s the only product of glam glow that I’ve used but I’ve bought 3 of them so far and will continue to do so! Love the way it tightens your skin and you really can feel The difference when you rinse it off!
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Awesomeness
customer_reviews.text: Now before you buy just remember it is an exfoliating mask with pieces of leaves inside that tingles... This mask leaves your face feeling amazing!!! Use once a week... well worth the price....
customer_reviews.author: smiley6897

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Makes my face burn but it's a great feeling knowing my face is getting clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Mask
customer_reviews.text: Its my first time ever to try masks in general, This one is really really great i used most of the time 2 times a week. Honestly Worth the cost
customer_reviews.author: Noha arafa

customer_reviews.title: I used it before using the deep cleansing pore strip
customer_reviews.text: My friend said it was a good product for blackhead so I ordered one. I don't really see it work very effectively. It is very expensive, and I won't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kiara. Z

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really Love it!. It feels fresh and clean My skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: some times I don't even need to wear any makeup because my face looks neutrally beautiful,, I love this product
customer_reviews.text: It truly works it leaves my face feeling soft and fresh, I will continue to use,, ideal for a special occasion to get your face to glow, some times I don't even need to wear any makeup because my face looks neutrally beautiful,, I love this product
customer_reviews.author: Ana Iris

customer_reviews.title: Great mask for "mature" skin
customer_reviews.text: Like all "mature" women, I am chasing the fountain of youth. I had heard so much about this mud mask and I was not disappointed. The energizing tingle let me know it was working. Left my skin soft and with a polished look. I am very pleased with this purchase and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Karen R

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: Pretty awesome mask. You feel the tingle as stated on the product.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Chung

customer_reviews.title: Causes chemical burn
customer_reviews.text: Caused a chemical burn on mine AND my husbands face. He does not have sensitive skin at all. If anything I want my money back that's an awful lot to pay for skin damage.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome just as described
customer_reviews.text: Awesome just as described. I would say that the amount in a jar is a bit small, considering they tell you to use the product twice a week, but I do see my skin getting firmer and brighter after each use.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Cobb

customer_reviews.title: Always amazing.
customer_reviews.text: This is the only facemask that I truly notice a difference with every single time. It makes me skin so much healthier, it makes make up look better. It is so worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: I don’t see this working any different than any other face mask
customer_reviews.text: I don’t see this working any different than any other face mask that I have used before.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Brown

customer_reviews.title: DEEP down clean!
customer_reviews.text: Active and over 60. Love to wear makeup! This product cleans so well that all those hidden makeup particles are no match for Glam Glow. Your skin feels taut but strangely not dry which is important for me. The expense means that I am likely to recommend but not to share with friends.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine H. Palmore

customer_reviews.title: SO-SO
customer_reviews.text: This is nothing special, leaves your skin smooth after you use it, but as far as any glow, I don't think it holds up to the hype.

customer_reviews.title: Real product!
customer_reviews.text: Why would anyone pay $20+ more at Sephora, this is great!!

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! it's my go to product if I have an event. like a mini facial in a jar!

customer_reviews.text: REALLY WORTH THE MONEY, I LOVE USING THIS PRODUCT. AMAZING AND SKIN JUST FEELS WONDERFUL AFTERWARDS. SKIN DOESNT FEEL DRY AT ALL.

customer_reviews.text: Really good mask. I have used several different mask by several companies and this has been the best for exfoliating. It does tingle as stated but did not burn. Nice smell to it, light. I have not noticed a reduction in pore size or firming yet for the price. Will continue to use it & see if my pores reduce, etc.

customer_reviews.title: The most amazing face product on the market
customer_reviews.text: Best face mask ever I’ve never had my face so rejuvenated. It’s a truly amazing product

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Angel boy he loves this mask.

customer_reviews.title: Must Have
customer_reviews.text: I Love this product! I'm always trying products to compare what is best and this product is worth spending on! Outstanding Product!

customer_reviews.text: The jar was not in its original packaging which is how it should be received when classified as 'new'. The jar also had scratches on it. Bottom line, it appeared used. I promptly returned it.

customer_reviews.title: Love this, I used it wkly and now only ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this,I used it wkly and now only need to use 1-2 times a mo.

customer_reviews.title: face scrub
customer_reviews.text: very good for home spa . Treat yourself with very good scrub

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mask/exfoliator! I love to use the ThirstMud after this one.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can't go wrong with glamglow! My skin feels so refreshed after using this product!

customer_reviews.title: Great product, more than $20 cheaper on here than ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, more than $20 cheaper on here than it is at sephora. I use it as a mask but also as a spot treatment for my really oily zones.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Epstein

customer_reviews.title: Awesomeee
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is magical. Use as little as possible per application. I glopped it on the first time and cried as it burned!
customer_reviews.author: theAyKay

customer_reviews.title: Best mask cleanser there is.
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny! This mask is easy to apply, let it dry out, as it does it will begin to tingle your skin. Feel that cleaning power in action! you will see chunks of volcanic ash in it, that is completely normal. As you wash off massage into skin. I have combination skin and this one product helps with my dry, oily, and patchy spots. usually i have to use multiple products for these results! Also after research this is the best bang for your buck! Such a wonder product all around
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Pechette

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got to me in a timely matter and I loved how smooth my skin looked afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Nyla

customer_reviews.title: It has a gritty feel to it which exfoliates wonderfully when you wash it off
customer_reviews.text: It has a gritty feel to it which exfoliates wonderfully when you wash it off. It's strong, but without the excessive drying effect that most of the stronger masks entail.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Wood

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product . I always used it every weekend and I could feel the smooth of my skin . I recommended to everyone !! Glamglow , glam face !!
customer_reviews.author: Leila

customer_reviews.title: Love the Glow !!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for giving your skin a quick boost. It brings a nice color to your skin, removes the dead surface cells and makes your skin very smooth. I've purchased this before from other retailers and once again Amazon Smile beats their price hands on and I don't have to drive to the store ! I use this primarily when I travel for work, in different time zones when I am usually very tired. It makes my skin look revived when I don't feel that way at all.
customer_reviews.author: Raleigh Cat Lover

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive combination skin so it was a little painful but you can really see the difference the next day , plus it washes off really easily unlike some other mud masks...the only down side is the price and the amount of product you get but other than that's it's amazing

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this before from official website. They are not the same. This one is so dry.

customer_reviews.title: I don't think I can live without it and recommend to all my mates
customer_reviews.text: After reading so many positive review.. I gave it a go.. Only positive surprise it does work! I don't think I can live without it and recommend to all my mates. The sting feeling only takes in for less than a minute and bearable.. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Venus

customer_reviews.title: amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. It is the exact one as at Sephora. I love the tingling sensation, then the tightness, then the hardening effect of the mask. It works well if you scrub the skin with it first, let dry (it will start tingling),then harden.
customer_reviews.author: MAY KUE

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: i like it, i thought it's good when i didn't try the white jar, after using the white jar, i found that this one is good, but the white one is great!

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff - you see and feel a difference.

customer_reviews.title: This mask is fantastic. Deep clearing without drying
customer_reviews.text: This mask is fantastic. Deep clearing without drying. Highly recommend it to others.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have used a lot of facial masks but this one really does what it promises. Pores are clean and look smaller and skin feels wonderful. Not cheap but worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: mrskala

customer_reviews.title: Great mask
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after receiving a sample. My daughter uses this regularly on her acne prone skin. You can see the mask pulling oil out of the pores as it dries. Final result is brighter, softer skin. One word of warning- this product can sting, especially if you have sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love that this item is $20 cheaper than it is ...
customer_reviews.text: I love that this item is $20 cheaper than it is on Sephora. Mine did not come open or damaged. Although it seems like a little amount of product, you don't need much for each use. It's lasted me over two months now and it keeps my skin tight and feeling clean. There is an extreme tingleness at first, but once you wash it all off, you'll notice results almost immediately. This is by far my favorite exfoliating face mask.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Love hate
customer_reviews.text: Love the way it makes my skin look but I'm scared to put it on because my face burns until it goes numb.
customer_reviews.author: NJ08736

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I had the pleasure of receiving many samples from sephora, but it wasn't enough! $69 is way too much at the store too, so I figured I would look around. I am SO GLAD that I found this for only $34! I will definitely keep it in my regimen.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: It is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this mask after reading other reviews...and it is all they said it would be and more. I use it twice a week and see the difference in my skin over these past few weeks. More radiant. I would encourage anyone sitting on the fence over the purchase of this product to definitely go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie York

customer_reviews.title: Must buy! Worth the $$$
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Tingles & refreshes your face. I was so smooth and brightened after using this. Highly recommend!

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really like this product, makes my skin feel extremely clean and fresh!

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exfoliated great, but not any better than something I could have made or bought from a drugstore

customer_reviews.title: It's Okay
customer_reviews.text: I tried this facial mask due to the media I've heard about it. I gave it a try and it's just ok to me. I do my own at home glycolic and salcyic acid peels and follow with a moisturzing peel. I also use Lancer Rx polish daily which is a God send for my oily skin. This was a good try, but not the best exfoliator for me.
customer_reviews.author: jitterbug242

customer_reviews.title: SAVE YOUR MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: I literally got 2 uses out this! Then it dried up and hardened and cannot use. I kept the lid shut tight and stored In a safe place. As for the mask itself I didn't see anything special...maybe because I only got to use 2 times!
customer_reviews.author: Joey Villalobos

customer_reviews.title: Good mud mask
customer_reviews.text: Saw several bloggers using this product so purchased. The mud has large pieces of seaweed or something. The smell is not bad either. Dries like a typical mud mask. What I like best is when you remove it gently exfoliates your skin and leaves your face feeling clean, smooth and tighter than it did to begin with. I enjoy the mask.
customer_reviews.author: McZack

customer_reviews.title: it works not bad!
customer_reviews.text: works well. clearly clean the pores but it doesn't work with the blackhead and acne. Anyway, as a deep clean mask for skin, it works not bad!

customer_reviews.title: The item is faked. I used glamglow from sephora ...
customer_reviews.text: The item is faked. I used glamglow from sephora before. The texture and the color is so different. Also my skin started to burn and irritate after use
customer_reviews.author: jiahui he

customer_reviews.title: I use GlamGlow products and like them. They are very abrasive
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a friend for her birthday. I use GlamGlow products and like them. They are very abrasive, so if you have sensitive skin be careful, this will dry you out and may not be for you. But it does make your face feel really clean afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: TheHBIC

customer_reviews.title: did not meet expectations at all
customer_reviews.text: I saw great reviews on this product. I have used it several times and did not find that it made much difference in my skin. It did not perform any better than an over the counter exfoliant. Very dissappointed. Would not recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Chmiel

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this product makes my skin feel and look. It gives my skin a youthful glow that I love. I also love the way it smells.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Lee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I use it each day. Will see if it does what it's suppose to do.
customer_reviews.author: Iris Murphy

customer_reviews.title: What I expected
customer_reviews.text: This product has quite a "tingle affect". I left the product on for approximately 15 min after it dried completely. It seemed to tighten my skin and decrease fine lines, but was drying (which is not bad for me since my skin is slightly oily). A little pricey, but I like the product and the way it makes my skin feel. I don't expect a miracle from facial creams, masks or any topical products, so I was not disappointed. I am 52 ( told I look 42) and I maintain my skin with regular professional facial treatments, these at home products are just "extras".
customer_reviews.author: Tiffney A. Foushee

customer_reviews.title: the worst mud must i ever use
customer_reviews.text: it is the worst mud must i ever use. it becomes very dry in 3 mins so I have to use mist spay 3 times to keep it wet when i doing the mask. What's more, the mask is very rough, so i have to wash it carefully or i will hurt myself. The price of the mask is much higher than it quality.
customer_reviews.author: Fei Zhan

customer_reviews.title: An excellent exfoliator
customer_reviews.text: The only reason this item loses a star is due to cost. Otherwise, it is a fantastic cleanser. I use it every 5 days on the regular, and immediately notice a reduction in blemishes. It burns a bit putting on, but smells fantastic, and feels tingly and wonderful when smoothing off. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Faeriequeen3

customer_reviews.title: knock knock, its glamglow
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought glamglow from a different store. than we found out that amazon has better prices. just to confirm how amazing this product is, its just the best I ever had in my entire life! I do not buy this to often because we do not need it so often, but it is definitely the only brand we get.

It's not a bad product, I like the tingling sensation and the smell is not bad at all. The best part of this mask is when you scrub it off your face, your skin feels really nice, smooth and exfoliated without breaking out. I put it on at least once a week and it's been a good product to use for me and I'm in my forties with dry breakout-prone skin.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for those small bumps on your face.
customer_reviews.text: This mask is amazing. Every now and then i get small bumps on my forhead and when i use this mask it exfoliates that issue and by morning my skin is glowing...LOVE THIS PRODUCT...worth every penny.

customer_reviews.text: This mask is wonderful. I don't mind the smell, I don't even notice it. It has improved my pores, and that is a really big deal for me. I leave it on for 20 minutes.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My professional wedding makeup artist swears by this product. I used it twice with my mom the week before my wedding and it feels amazing. It makes your skin tight and glows!

customer_reviews.text: Wow Firstly I like the smell.... When i am using it , my skin feels like burning .. But this is the effect that how the mud mask working haha After I clean the mask, my skin is like silk and I really really like the mask!
customer_reviews.author: Zeng Runqiu

customer_reviews.title: Finally a Product that does what it says!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, noticed results after first use. This product definitely does what it says. My skin looks and feels amazing along with pore reduction. For the first time in many years I feel confident to leave the house without or very little make up!
customer_reviews.author: Rita V.

product_meta.title: Glam Glow Tingling and Exfoliating Mud Mask, 1.7 Ounce
product_meta.description: Size:1.7 Ounce| Color:N/AThis product is made of high quality material. It is recommended for romantic wear. This Product Is Manufactured In USA.
